# Sistemas de Financiamentos

Projeto que fiz na faculdade usando Java e POO ![]([[https://64.media.tumblr.com/55e062b0c5976f5a55236d046911532f/tumblr_inline_p81vs67K7X1qgg3e5_75sq.gifv](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5552cb82-6fb8-4c7f-9d29-a10b2e5daf6c/db91rcl-18f5db41-2df7-416a-8976-3b56f5bed046.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YYO3cCQH7jhnCjnnd0unwxSirRXGyPg_I12Mh7B9pek)](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5552cb82-6fb8-4c7f-9d29-a10b2e5daf6c/db91rcl-18f5db41-2df7-416a-8976-3b56f5bed046.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YYO3cCQH7jhnCjnnd0unwxSirRXGyPg_I12Mh7B9pek)https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5552cb82-6fb8-4c7f-9d29-a10b2e5daf6c/db91rcl-18f5db41-2df7-416a-8976-3b56f5bed046.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YYO3cCQH7jhnCjnnd0unwxSirRXGyPg_I12Mh7B9pek)
 . O código funciona com sistemas de financiamento para 3 opções:
`Apartamento` , `Casa` e `Terreno`.
